books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The 18th book in the Women's Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer investigates the disappearance of three female teachers.
books.name: THE 18TH ABDUCTION

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by E L James
books.description: Maxim Trevelyan inherits several estates and beds his cleaner Alessia Demachi, an Albanian piano prodigy who has been trafficked into England.
books.name: THE MISTER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The fifth book in the Memory Man series. The first man Amos Decker put behind bars asks to have his name cleared.
books.name: REDEMPTION

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 29th book in the Prey series. Lucas Davenport goes after a serial killer.
books.name: NEON PREY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born and a Canadian couple now find themselves stranded.
books.name: PAST TENSE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Basis of the HBO series.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The 18th book in the Scot Harvath series. As a war looms, a counterterrorism operative takes on a new role his own way.
books.name: SPYMASTER

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: The second book in the Moonlight and Motor Oil series. Two brothers fall for two sisters in Kentucky.
books.name: THE SLOW BURN

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Lauren Delaney leaves her controlling husband and meets a man in a rocky marriage.
books.name: THE VIEW FROM ALAMEDA ISLAND

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Former high school sweethearts fall tentatively back into each other’s orbits after more than a decade.
books.name: UNFINISHED BUSINESS

books.author: by Stephanie Laurens
books.description: Miss Sylvia Buckleberry confronts an aristocrat when his yacht business displaces her school for impoverished children.
books.name: THE PURSUITS OF LORD KIT CAVANAUGH

books.author: by Allison Brennan
books.description: The 15th book in the Lucy Kincaid series. An F.B.I. agent uncovers lies when she tracks a killer of married men.
books.name: NOTHING TO HIDE
